channel.title: Comments on: Yes, But What About The Legacy?

item.title: by: Mitch Barnett
item.description:
I agree with Alex B. – SOA is the biggest and baddest buzzword to hit our IT industry to date. See: SOA – Towards The Industrialization Of Software

With respect to legacy systems, being first class citizens exposing data; to quote Don Box, “Message, oh message, the truth is on the wire. There is nothing else.” And that is the point of SOA. Who cares if it came from a legacy RDBMS or anything else for that matter, the truth is still on the wire. And everyone wants to know the truth, right? :-)
